mapper.sql: a.building_no as buildingNo,a.building_name as buildingName, t.CUSTOMER_EXPIRATION_ID as customerExpirationId,t.BUILDING_ID as buildingId,t.CUSTOMER_NAME as customerName, to_char(t.REMIND_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as remindDate, t.DELETE_FLAG as deleteFlag, t.CREATE_DATE as createDate, t.REMIND_FLAG as remindFlag,decode(t.REMIND_FLAG, 0, '不需要', 1, '需要') as remindFlagName
mapper.select:
select
from bd_customer_expiration t join bd_building a on t.building_id = a.building_id join SPC_REGION r on a.region_id = r.region_id join SPC_REGION ds on r.super_region_id = ds.region_id where t.delete_flag = 0 and a.delete_flag = 0
and a.CREATE_STAFF_ID = #{createStaffId}
AND a.region_id in (select r.region_id from spc_region r start with r.region_id = #{dsRegionId} connect by prior r.region_id = r.super_region_id)
AND a.region_id = #{regionId}
AND t.building_id = (select A.building_id from bd_building A where A.building_no like '%'||#{buildingNo}||'%')
AND t.building_id in (select A.building_id from bd_building A where A.building_name like '%'||#{buildingName}||'%')
AND t.customer_name like '%'||#{customerName}||'%'
AND to_char(t.remind_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') like '%'||#{remindDate}||'%'
order by t.customer_expiration_id desc
mapper.insert:
select seq_bd_customer_expiration.nextval as customerExpirationId from dual
insert into bd_customer_expiration(CUSTOMER_EXPIRATION_ID,BUILDING_ID,CUSTOMER_NAME,DELETE_FLAG,CREATE_DATE,REMIND_FLAG,REMIND_DATE) values (#{customerExpirationId},#{buildingId},#{customerName},#{deleteFlag}, #{createDate},#{remindFlag},to_date(#{remindDate},'YYYY-MM-DD'))
mapper.select:
select
from bd_customer_expiration t join bd_building a on t.building_id = a.building_id where t.delete_flag = 0 and a.delete_flag = 0 and t.CUSTOMER_EXPIRATION_ID = #{customerExpirationId} order by t.CUSTOMER_EXPIRATION_ID
mapper.update: update bd_customer_expiration t set t.building_id = #{buildingId}, t.CUSTOMER_NAME=#{customerName},t.REMIND_FLAG=#{remindFlag},t.REMIND_DATE = to_date(#{remindDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') where t.CUSTOMER_EXPIRATION_ID = #{customerExpirationId} and t.delete_flag = 0
